A louers newest curranto, or, The lamentation of a young mans folly to a pleasant new tune. Barnfield, Richard, 1574-1627.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill.
For L.W., Printed at London : [ca. 1625]
Attributed to Richard Barnfield by STC (2nd ed.) Contains two illustrations. Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.
